name: AI-powered Personalized Avatars
description: Create unique and customizable avatars that reflect a user's personality and preferences

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Prompts
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Based on information {{face}} {{hair}} {{style}} {{skin_tone}} write a long prompts for AI to generate image.
Example:
Create a photorealistic image of a young woman with long, flowing brown hair and hazel eyes. She is wearing a casual outfit of a white t-shirt, jeans, and sneakers. Her expression is friendly and welcoming, and she has a warm smile. The background is a soft blur of pastel colors, suggesting a sense of openness and creativity.

nodes.name: generate_image
nodes.title: Generate Image
nodes.description: Use AI to generate images from your imagination. Simply describe what you want to see, and watch the AI bring it to life.

face.title: Describe The Face
face.description: Customize the overall facial features of your avatar.

hair.title: Describe The Hairstyle
hair.description: Customize the hairstyle and hair color of your avatar

style.title: Style
style.description: The overall look and feel of your avatar
